medium: Lacquer with sprinkled gold and silver designs
title: Small Box (Kobako) in the shape of a Rolled Bamboo Blind
description: Box, in form of partly unrolled kakemono. Exposed part displays red flowers and gold leaves in low relief against gold background. The \'brocade\' is gold and green. Below is geometrical design in red and gold. The \'ribbons\' are in gold low relief.
